<traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 187 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

While some learn the art of ritual casting through rigorous study, other gifted individuals may find that a combination of natural talent and luck gives them surprising skill at performing [rituals](/Rules.aspx?ID=777), whether they want that power or not.
